Title: Relates to directing the chancellor of the New York city school district to establish a student fare program
Summary: Directs the chancellor of the New York city school district to establish, in consultation with the metropolitan transportation authority, a student fare program to provide three free fares each weekday to New York city students who live a half mile or more from the school they attend.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to directing the chancellor of the New York city school district to establish a student fare program
